entities.description: Feelings interfering with relationships during a certain period of time.
Level of interference due to feelings with relationships.
Indicator value ranging from 0 to 10 for the interference level.
Feelings interfering with social life during a certain period of time.
Level of interference due to feelings with social life.
Indicator value ranging from 0 to 10 for the interference level.
Days unable to work or carry out daily activities in the past 12 months due to feelings.
Number of days ranging from 0 to 365 indicating the inability to work or carry out daily activities.

relationships.description: Relates feeling interference to the interference level with relationships.
Indicates the numeric value for the level of interference in relationships.
Relates feeling interference to the interference level with social life.
Indicates the numeric value for the level of interference in social life.
Relates feelings to days unable to work or carry out daily activities.
Indicates the number of days of inability to work or carry out daily activities.
